snippet: GENATT--Les. The finest man you could have in your life. As a brother, friend, business partner, athlete, Husband, Dad, Grandpa, competitor - hard to ask for more. Will leave a huge void in all the people he touched. Rest in Peace - we will all miss you. Stephen and Arlene Genatt Simone, James, Jacob, Harry Haft Peter, Tasha, Elie, Sam, Aerin Genatt 1/3
lead_paragraph: GENATT--Les. The finest man you could have in your life. As a brother, friend, business partner, athlete, Husband, Dad, Grandpa, competitor - hard to ask for more.
